title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: The synchronization feature does not work when trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the synchronization feature.
3. Choose a .java file and another resource to synchronize.
4. Attempt to synchronize them.
5. Note that the synchronization does not occur as expected.
